title: 1497: Five Weird Supplements That Actually Work
description:
In this episode Sal, Adam & Justin discuss some lesser known  supplements that actually work.

  • Mind Pump’s history with supplements. (2:30)
  • Five Weird Supplements That Actually Work. (15:00)
  • #1 – Ecdysterone. (16:27)
  • #2 – Cordyceps. (24:12)
  • #3 – Lion's Mane. (28:55)
  • #4 - Horny Goat Weed. (33:20)
  • #5 – Ashwagandha. (38:54)
  • Mind Pump’s stance on supplementation. (43:15)

  • Neurotrophic properties of the Lion's mane medicinal mushroom, Hericium erinaceus (Higher Basidiomycetes) from Malaysia
